item.title: How to move WordPress without breaking web links
item.description: WordPress allows you to specify your blog url as, for example, www.ipreferjim.com/site. It also allows you to run the blog from the base of your domain, e.

item.title: Godaddy URL Rewrite Fix for directory without trailing slash
item.description: Not too long ago, I upgraded my godaddy.com hosting account from the linux basic to windows deluxe plans. I did this because I have multiple domains Iâ€™d like to host with a single company.
